skipiste.graph

Class GraphValidator

    • skipiste.graph.GraphValidator

  • public class GraphValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs basic graph validation.
    Author:
    s1011122

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void validateEdges(java.util.Set<Edge> edges)
      Validates edges All edges must have one origin and one destination, and these must be different Edges must belong to a piste Must not have null weight
      static void validateGraph(Graph g)
      Validates that the graph created is correct accordin to some basic rules 1) All Start nodes must have at least one outbound node 2) All End nodes must have at least one inbound node 3) All Interections must have (a) More than 1 outbout node and 1 inbound node OR (b) more than 1 inbound node and 1 outbound node OR (c) more than 1 outbound node and more than 1 inbound node.
      static void validateNodes(java.util.Set<Node> nodes)
      1) All Start nodes must have at least one outbound node 2) All End nodes must have at least one inbound node 3) All Interections must have (a) More than 1 outbout node and 1 inbound node OR (b) more than 1 inbound node and 1 outbound node OR (c) more than 1 outbound node and more than 1 inbound node.

    • Method Detail

      • validateGraph

        public static void validateGraph(Graph g)
        Validates that the graph created is correct accordin to some basic rules 1) All Start nodes must have at least one outbound node 2) All End nodes must have at least one inbound node 3) All Interections must have (a) More than 1 outbout node and 1 inbound node OR (b) more than 1 inbound node and 1 outbound node OR (c) more than 1 outbound node and more than 1 inbound node. 4) All other nodes must have 1 outbound node and 1 inbound node. If any of these conditions are not met then the graph has not built correctly. 5) All edges must have one origin and one destination, and these must be different

      • validateEdges

        public static void validateEdges(java.util.Set<Edge> edges)
        Validates edges All edges must have one origin and one destination, and these must be different Edges must belong to a piste Must not have null weight
        Parameters:
        edges -

      • validateNodes

        public static void validateNodes(java.util.Set<Node> nodes)
        1) All Start nodes must have at least one outbound node 2) All End nodes must have at least one inbound node 3) All Interections must have (a) More than 1 outbout node and 1 inbound node OR (b) more than 1 inbound node and 1 outbound node OR (c) more than 1 outbound node and more than 1 inbound node. 4) All other nodes must have 1 outbound node and 1 inbound node. If any of these conditions are not met then the graph has not built correctly
